resources.string: If you are not driving, wait 20 seconds or press button to unlock the device
If you are not driving, wait 20 seconds or enter pay number to unlock device:
Unlocking with your pay number will be reviewed by management.
Build the list of Vehicles for the Shuttle Load
AutoTran needs the ID-Engine app installed in order to scan barcodes via the camera.
Not connected to ID-Engine scanner service
No scanners are available. Install a scanner driver, plug in your scanner, or select a scanner driver in Settings.
Your scanner of choice is not available. Plug in your scanner, or select a different scanner.
Could not connect to ID-Engine scanner service
Please scan a barcode using the laser scanner or the camera scanner. If you are unable to scan the barcode, enter it manually.

string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Make sure your ramps are down!

resources.string: There is a new version of Autotran available, please update this application through Airwatch. If you have any questions please contact your dispatcher.
Enter your pay number to confirm:
Forcing loads to be uploaded to server
Pay Number entered does not match number on file.
WARNING! This delivery is for a high claims dealer!
Take a picture of your pick sheet with a signature or stamp from the yard inspector.
In case a claim is filed on this unit, we need to validate the possibility of travel after delivery. Please take a picture of the vehicle\'s odometer.
- Delivery might have been during regular delivery hours -
Awaiting Supervisor Signature for Significant Damages

Some damage codes have been entered on this unit during previous moves. You are not covered for these damages unless you properly note them in accordance with local yard rules. Codes entered by inspection companies appear in GREEN and do not require additional coverage.
Explain, in detail, how this damage or shortage occurred (describing the exact size of damage):
This information is for internal use only and will not be displayed on the receipt
The number of units you specified do not match the number of Vehicles added to the load. Choose one of the following options to either update or autocorrect the number of units.
Use dropdown above to change load size
Tap or scan VIN to select
Tap or scan VIN to view
THIS DEALER DOES NOT ACCEPT AFTER HOURS DELIVERIES!
You must get approval from terminal management to deliver without a joint inspection. By entering your pay number, you affirm that your management has provided this approval.
The following information is missing for this dealer:\n
Click on the link below to provide the missing information via the Cassens website.
COVID-19 contactless deliveries are no longer allowed
Reason: Dealer open, but cannot or will not sign
Please contact local management or call &epodSupportPhoneInfo;
If you continue to have conflicts with the truck-supplied number, call &epodSupportPhoneInfo;
You must get approval from your dispatcher/manager to deliver in this manner. Please provide the names and information requested below.
Name of Dealer Contact confirming this condition
Enter the name of the person who is unavailable or refusing to sign

ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO DELIVER STI? (Press CANCEL to change your selection.)\n\nThis dealer does not allow after hours deliveries. Please provide the name of the authorized person who approved this delivery and the reason for the exception.

ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO DELIVER STI? (Press CANCEL to change your selection.)\n\nYou appear to be delivering STI during the dealer\'s check-in hours (%s). Please provide the name of the authorized person who approved this delivery and the reason for the exception.
"This dealer requires an advance call to approve After Hours (STI) deliveries. Please provide the name of the authorized person who provided the approval."
Enter your pay number to affirm that the dealer is open, but unavailable to sign
Explain, in detail, why the delivery area was not safe

string-array.name: driver_high_claims_questions
string-array.item: Number of preload exceptions were verified and signed off by the appropriate personnel.
All decks and sliders were safety pinned during loading.
The appropriate tie down bar was used while loading truck.
There are proper clearances between loaded cargo units.
Vehicle has been strapped properly, using straps in good condition, having all three cleats.
There is no contact between any strap and cargo unit.
Load height was checked before leaving loading area.
Turn and dip clearances were checked after loading and before leaving loading area.
All deck slider pins and safety pins have been checked.
All post pins are securely set and locked in place.
Keys have been removed from vehicles and vehicles are locked.
Truck is equipped with a blank paper log and a Keller Roadside Inspection Guide.

resources.string: Your driver\'s license will expire in the next 7 days.
Your driver\'s license has expired. You can no longer start preloads or shuttle loads.
During Delivery Hours\n(dealer unavailable or refusing to sign)
Scan the supervisor tag again to finish coaching.\n\nSupervisor:
Different supervisor tag detected. Scan the same supervisor\'s tag again to finish coaching.\n\nSupervisor:
Non-supervisor tag detected. Scan the supervisor\'s tag again to finish coaching.\n\nSupervisor:
Must be all digits and between 4000-100000
If you meant to scan a route code, please use the "Scan Route" button instead.
Scanned barcode is not a valid VIN.
This VIN cannot be shipped. Please find a different vehicle or contact your dispatch.
Scanned barcode is not a valid route code.
Scanned barcode is not a valid production status code.
It appears to be a VIN.
AutoTran needs you to grant it the following permission(s):

If you press Set Permissions, you will be taken to the Apps menu of the Android Settings app. To grant the needed permission(s), select AutoTran from menu, then select Permissions and turn on all listed permissions.\n\nWhen you have granted the required permissions, press the back button until you are returned to AutoTran.

This handheld needs permission to access the truck computer. To fix this: 

STEP 1: Undock and re-dock the handheld. 

STEP 2: When you see a dialog like the one below, check the checkbox and press OK to grant permission.
This will NOT interfere with other apps.

AutoTran is having trouble communicating with the truck computer. Often this occurs when the handheld if rebooted or powered on while docked. Undocking and re-docking the handheld device will usually re-establish the connection and clear up the problem.
